title: Himi 298
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ke tau fakafeta’i
Ki hotau Otua,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa lahi,
Kia kitautolu.
2.
Mo ‘ene langa’i,
‘I he loto kovi,
‘A e feinga ke lelei
Mo ‘ene ‘Afio.
3.
Pea fekau ia,
Ki he angahala,
‘I māmani kotoa pē,
Ke fakatomala.
4.
Ke hoko ‘o ui,
Ki hono huafa,
‘E he kakai angakovi,
Mo e tō ki lalo.
5.
Pea ke nau kumi,
‘A e loto tui,
Mo e fakamolemole,
‘I he’enau hia.
6.
Mo e loto ‘ofa,
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Pea fai talangofua,
Ki he’ene fekau. *
